name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Fullstack Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience, specializing in high-performance applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js**, along with **React**, **Next.js**, and **NestJS** for seamless front-end and back-end integration. Proficient in developing maintainable and secure applications with a solid foundation in **PostgreSQL** for robust data management. I have a strong background in performance optimization and security best practices, ensuring compliance with industry standards. My experience extends to leveraging **AWS** and **Kubernetes** for cloud solutions, enhancing scalability and efficiency.

Notably, I have led the development of versatile platforms in the healthcare and financial sectors, integrating cutting-edge technologies for user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design. With a focus on microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, I am dedicated to delivering high-quality code that minimizes downtime and enhances maintainability.
